name: Nature Analiz
short_description:
Create a program as play Google, one take a photo of a flower, a plant, a fruit or a vegetable, then the program analyzes the image to find a correspondence in the database and take(bring) out the information about the result(profit); description, virtues, danger, recipe(takings)...

I put this ideas here because I am a graphic designer, I can create the interface but do not possess knowledge necessary for the development of this program, then if you can help me, I do not want to gain(win) money(silver), just to participate in a useful project-.-
Thank you for your ideas, advice(council) and efforts!
